text:
Meraki / http://meraki.com / San Francisco We are re-imagining how enterprise networking gear should work. We started with wireless and have moved into routers. We have a ton of customers (our website has case studies) but have a small, tight-nit engineering team.

I am looking for people that like building web uis (javascript/ruby/scala), backend engineers, and firmware hackers. We have openings on the business side also. Email me if you're interested. I'm the CTO. jbicket@meraki.com
